long_description: Batten down the hatches with the REI Havenpass hat to keep cold air and blowing snow from working its way in. eVent fabric has a unique membrane that allows sweat vapor to escape to the outside of the fabric in 1 easy step. No matter how hard you work, overheating is highly unlikely due to this Direct Venting(TM) technology. Plush fleece lining insulates and wicks moisture. Rip-and-stick closure connects the earflaps under your chin for maximum warmth. 1.625 in. foam brim keeps the sun and snowflakes out of your eyes.
short_description: Batten down the hatches with the REI Havenpass hat to keep cold air and blowing snow from working its way in.
